name: Mask Console
description: The Mask Console Table by Kifu Paris is a versatile and organic piece. The amorphous top and base are inlaid in a mixture of shagreen, white quartz or shell and bronze-patina brass. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti. Available as a nesting side table and a coffee table. Currently made to order 8-10 weeks. Design SKU reference KCON13. All Kifu Paris pieces are handmade by artisans, ultimately making each piece unique. Custom color/sizing available on request. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines.
